amendment.description: To provide pay protection for members of the Reserve and the National Guard, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 620 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 620 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 163.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 620.
Amendment SA 620 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S6238-6239; text: CR S6238-6239) To provide pay protection for members of the Reserve and the National Guard, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 620 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 163.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 620 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
